goal: Update skills repository by pulling latest changes from git remote
acceptance_criteria: Repository path is resolved via environment variables
Changes to about.md are detected and reported
User is notified when context refresh is needed

features.name: Resolve Repository Path
features.test_scenario: Given MY_SKILLS_REPO or SKILLS_GROUP_DIR is set, When I resolve the path, Then correct repository directory is identified
features.expected_result: Repository root directory path is determined and validated

features.name: Detect Git Repository
features.test_scenario: Given a directory path, When I check for .git folder, Then I can determine if it's a git repository
features.expected_result: Boolean result indicating if directory is a git repository

features.name: Pull Updates for Single Repo
features.test_scenario: Given a single git repository, When I run git pull, Then latest changes are fetched and merged
features.expected_result: Repository is updated to latest remote version

features.name: Pull Updates for Skills Group
features.test_scenario: Given a skills group directory, When I iterate subdirectories, Then all git repositories are updated
features.expected_result: All skill repositories in group are updated

features.name: Detect about.md Changes
features.test_scenario: Given about.md before and after pull, When I compare file hashes, Then changes are detected
features.expected_result: User is notified if about.md changed and context refresh is needed
